title: 求救！！MCBBS服进不去！！
author: 阿人王子
txt_content:
我符合注册的一切要求，在学校也登陆上去了，但是在家一登陆就崩，怎么回事？？
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      


Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Ticking screen


A full error report has been saved to F:\MCBBS服4周目客户端\MCBBS服4周目客户端\crash-reports\crash-2013-11-01_22.28.49-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

50金！！
